Package loadbal

Class JobPool

java.lang.Object
loadbal.JobPool
public class JobPool
extends java.lang.Object
Job Pool class java file - Load Balancer version

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    JobPool()
    Constructor - initiates the singular job pool for use

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add​(Job j)
    Adds a job to the pool
    void display()
    Displays currently active jobs in the job pool

    Retrieves a job based on the job ID number

    Gets the next available incomplete job

    Checks for any incomplete jobs in the job pool

    Removes a job based on the job ID number
    int returnCompletedJob()
    Cycles through the job pool to find a completed job

    Reorders the job pool in order of arrival time

    • add

      public void add​(Job j)
      Adds a job to the pool
      Parameters:
      j - the job to add

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays currently active jobs in the job pool

    • getJobByID

      public Job getJobByID​(int ID)
      Retrieves a job based on the job ID number
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID number of the job to return
      Returns:
      the Job matching the Job ID

    • removeJobByID

      public void removeJobByID​(int ID)
      Removes a job based on the job ID number
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID number of the job to remove

    • returnCompletedJob

      public int returnCompletedJob()
      Cycles through the job pool to find a completed job
      Returns:
      completed job.

    • sortJobByArrival

      public Job sortJobByArrival()
      Reorders the job pool in order of arrival time
      Returns:
      the Job that has been in the pool the longest

    • getNextJob

      public Job getNextJob()
      Gets the next available incomplete job
      Returns:
      the incomplete Job that has been in the pool the longest

    • jobsAvailable

      public boolean jobsAvailable()
      Checks for any incomplete jobs in the job pool
      Parameters:
      ID - of the job
      Returns:
      true if there are incomplete jobs
